6d5c0da42fa54ceabbc1959e9db354ed64a2ff86.commitMessage:
Remove unnecessary this keyword. #1555

Fixes `UnnecessaryThis` inspection violations.

Description:
>Reports on any unnecessary uses of this in the code. Using this to disambiguate a code reference may easily become unnecessary via automatic refactorings, and is discouraged by many coding styles.
 For example:
 ```
 this.a = 3;
 ```

d5a27ed79b8484eb78086114bca1b84ec07d40ba.commitMessage:
upgraded to current release of google-collections, 0.9 / snapshot-20090211
* they moved some the factory methods for creating immutable sorted sets to a different class
* they removed the old convenient API for building singleton TreeSets in one line
* they removed RefernceMap in favor of MapMaker

13b7c634337e38d20daa92ca9d5e069a2e72ec55.commitMessage:
A large refactoring to move the functionality of open/reporting on files into Checker and out of FileSetCheck. The advantages are:

- reduces the logic required in each implementation of FileSetCheck.

- reduces, but not eliminates, the number of times a file is reported as being audited.

- reduces the amount of times a file needs to be read in from the file system.

The motivation is the desire to move more checks to be purely FileSetCheck based, like the TabCharacter check.

I still need to do some tidying up of the documentation, and make Checker support "charset".

17754d363645285e49bf4323a1af5762af47a8ea.commitMessage: snapshot of changes - need to refactor

788b41973d5747c7b4699a853b62168cf0001df6.commitMessage:
Changes to make it possible to identify a module by an id, and then to
suppress messages based on the id. The motivation is to allow for finer
grained suppressions. For example, can enable multiple instances of the
Regexp check, and suppress on the individual instance.

6db0b3effd48f02d741b2202338d710b1b254910.commitMessage:
Code cleanup to force the class name for the cause of the message to be
logged. Required as part of changes I am making for RFE 756416.

205cbab8af785b1cddb9c4123ff3fa8b63dcbe1c.commitMessage:
Added sourceName property to LocalizedMessage and AuditEvent.
Checks pass the class name as the sourceName to LocalizedMessage constructors.

5ace399de6c8963584b1fbe08007721433c4bad3.commitMessage:

54a09706ec1db32435b09e6b6910813325558f8d.commitMessage:
Introduced MessageDispatcher interface so
FileSetChecks do not need to be tightly coupled
with Checker to report errors.

FileSetCheck implementations report errors now.

Error counting in Checker is now done via an
AuditListener, no need to bother about that in
each individual FileSetCheck.
